name: Level Design Prototyping in Twine example project
name_original: Level Design Prototyping in Twine example project
description:
This project was created to be an example of creating simple level prototypes in Twine. In it are simple puzzle scenes, a combat scenario, and spatial navigation scenes (all created with choose-your-own-adventure logic.) 

The game itself can be played in browser, but the .zip file contains the html file that can be loaded into your own copy of Twine so that you can see how these scenes were built.
